overview:
Francisco Hurtado joined Locavorian in January 2012 and is now a partner and the companyâ€™s Chief Technical Officer. He is in charge of managing all IT and programming aspects of the business.

At this moment in time, he also works as Leader of the Internet and Software Department at Daimon Consulting, where he has worked for the past eight years. He has years of experience as a Senior Programmer Consultant offering web application development services to a wide range of clients. Fran has a strong expertise in PHP and MySQL as well as building websites using the Yii framework. He is also proficient in HTML/CSS and various APIs including Paypal, Google and Facebook.

Fran holds a Technical Degree in Graphic Design and Multimedia by Universidad Reina Victoria (Spain), as well as several technical certificates in PHP, HTML/CSS, Java and Microsoft Visual C.
